task.title: How to divide numbers
task.shortdesc: Here you will find instructions about using the division feature of the Calculator app.

prereq.p: To succesfully substract numbers, you must know what is division.

result.p: The result from the division is displayed.

example.p: You want to divide 9 and 3. The equation will look like: 9/3=3. You enter 9. Press divide. Enter 3. Press equals.
The result 3 appears on the screen.
